pullrequest.title: New user interaction method and resize functionality

content.raw:
Translation problem 1: Select an object using the translate tool. Then click and drag anywhere on the screen. The object will move, even if the cursor is not over the object.

Translation problem 2: Select an object using the translate tool. Hold down x, y, or z key. Click and drag on a different object. The other object will move. This is problematic when trying to precisely place object that slightly overlap. I would expect the first selected object to stay active if I have x,y, or z key pressed.
